reviewText: My girls love it. They've watched In the Night Garden since they were babies. I loved fantasy as a child and still do and I would transport myself into other worlds in my imagination. My girls are just like that and that's what we feel when watching this. It's silly, but life is tough enough, a little silly goes a long way.

This is the GREATEST CHILDS SERIES YOU CAN GET FOR SMALL CHILDREN AGES 1 THROUGH 5. THIS DVD WAS BOUGHT FOR A 2 YR OLDS BIRTHDAY. I NEVER BOUGHT THE DVD'S BUT FOR THIS SPECIAL BOY THIS WAS THE BEST BIRTHDAY PRESENT I COULD HAVE GIVEN HIM. IT'S SO CUTE TO SEE HIS FACE HOW HE INTERACTS WITH THESE LITTLE BEINGS OF THE NIGHT GARDEN. YOU WON'T BE SORRY IF YOU BUY ANY OF THSES DVD'S THEIR ALL WONDERFUL.  Susie H
